name: pytorch-complex
summary: PyTorch wrapper for complex-valued operations. Usage: Similar to PyTorch. For using the Complex features of this library, just change the regular torch imports with torchcomplex imports. For example: import torchcomplex.nn as nn instead of import torch.nn as nn Then, simply nn.Conv2d for both torch and torchcomplex, for 2D Convolution
author: Soumick Chatterjee, PhD
